direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate dates relative to the current time but in opposite directions (future vs. past).
Both methods generate dates within a specified range, though 'between' covers both past and future.
Both methods generate dates relative to the current time, though 'birthday' specifically targets age ranges.
Both methods involve generating time-based values (Instant vs. Duration) with similar control flows.
Both methods involve generating time-based values (Instant vs. Period) with similar control flows.
The 'future' method relies on 'formatInstant' for converting Instant to string representation, indicating a strong dependency.
